class gstTriPolyMeshHaptic : public gstShape, public gstModifyBase

Triangle polygon scene graph node. Represents a triangular polygon mesh that is haptically palpable.

From header file: gstTriPolyMeshHaptic.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstTriPolyMeshHapticDefined new gstTriPolysH object with empty polygon mesh.

Functions
CloneTriPolyMeshHaptic Virtual method to copy this gstTriPolyMeshHaptic object and return gstTriPolyMeshHaptic pointer to newly cloned object.
getSmoothing Returns TRUE if normal interpolation smoothing is to be used.
getTouchableFrom Returns RV_FRONT, RV_BACK, or RV_FRONT_AND_BACK to denote which sides of the triangles will be touchable by the PHANToM.
getTouchedPolys Returns a vector of pointers to gstTriPoly.
getTriPolyMesh Returns a pointer to the gstTriPolyMesh storing the polygonal mesh for this object.
setSmoothing If smoothing is TRUE normal interpolation smoothing is to be used.
setTouchableFrom Sets touchable sides of triangles to value of touchableFrom.
setTriPolyMesh Sets newTriMesh as the gstTriPolyMesh storing the polygonal mesh for this object.
updateBoundingShape Updates boundingObject based on current state of polygonal mesh.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
